resources.string: "There was an error retrieving your daily keys"
"The test version of the application requires permission to record device tracking logs."
"Currently, the application does not have any data to share. Please contact the Contact Centre to report the problem."
"The application has too much data to share. Please contact the Contact Centre to report the problem."
"Too many keys sent in one day. Please contact the Contact Centre to report the problem"
"There have been changes in the safety rules. Stay informed: select the poviats you want to follow and receive notifications about the current division into zones."
"There have been changes regarding security in the poviats that you don't follow. The full list of poviats with division into zones is available in the application and on gov.pl."
"There have been changes regarding 1 poviat that you follow: %2$s."
"There have been changes regarding %1$d poviats that you follow: %2$s."
